column3: News; Phnom Penh: ------A fire broke out from electricity wiring  at 11:40 pm on October 25
column6: Phnom Penh.------Local people took their own extinguishers to tackle the blaze before authorities arrived.------The flames were extinguished after about 20 minutes
column7: and no people or other property was damaged
column8: although local residents may be without power until the wires are replaced.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/381895------
